age.descp: Age of the person in years.

sex.descp: Gender of the person. 1 = Male, 0 = Female.

chest_pain.descp: Type of chest pain experienced by the person.0 = No Pain 1 = Typical angina, 2 = Atypical angina, 3 = Non-anginal pain, 4 = Asymptomatic.

resting_blood_pressure.descp: Resting blood pressure (in mm Hg) measured during the initial examination.

fasting_blood_sugar.descp: Fasting blood sugar greater than 120 mg/dl. 1 = True, 0 = False.

resting_ecg.descp: Resting electrocardiographic results. 0 = Normal, 1 = Having ST-T wave abnormality, 2 = Showing probable or definite left ventricular hypertrophy.
options: Showing probable or definite left ventricular hypertrophy

maximum_heart_rate.descp: Maximum heart rate achieved during exercise.

st_depression.descp: ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest.

slope_peak_exercise_st_segment.descp: Slope of the peak exercise ST segment. 1 = Upsloping, 2 = Flat, 3 = Downsloping.

number_major_vessels.descp: Number of major vessels (0-3) colored by fluoroscopy.

thalassemia.descp: Thalassemia. 3 = Normal, 6 = Fixed defect, 7 = Reversible defect.
